Development of an RFID Management System for the Optimization of Small-Sized Optical Health Establishments Development of ETL tools for charging patients and invoices for a dental clinic company Integration of the standard SAP WM module and RFID technology for the management of a raw material warehouse Mobile application for surface parking system in restricted area by using NFC technology Sisu Performance: Development of a web application to manage Inditex's warehouses. System for location in an environment using NFC technology Viability analysis on the use of smartphones for payment management using NFC technology Analysis and study of the application of Best Practices in Testing functions in the field of Business Intelligence Systems (BI) Development of a mobile tracking application for drivers through a pre-existing platform Development of a web-based system for the internal management of an engineering and architecture SME System for localization in an enviroment through the use of NFC technology Development of a system to obtain the traceability of online parcels in a company of the textile sector Development of an ERP system for a human resources consultancy Intelligent system to support the administration of medication for patients through the integration of RFID technology System for the management of medical reports, evolution control and classification of patients with obesity. Traceability system for the business management of the sale of fish in Guatemala through the integration of the SAP tool.
